__e: "Maybe not, maybe I should keep it as an heirloom," know what I mean?
I didn't want to part with it... but... my wife's jewel yesterday... sold... for over $300,000 without cheating anyone.
Because I've got a little gem of a car that could really use an outing.
The fucking thing is older than you are.
I don't know if the jewel is genuine or not.
So beautiful that piece of jewelry and so fine a sentiment- the heart.
